alert.note: Alert for Allen; Labette; Montgomery; Neosho; Wilson; Woodson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 14 at 3:06PM CST until February 15 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CST TUESDAY FOR EXTREME GRASSLAND FIRE DANGER FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 071...072... 095...096...099 AND 100... The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a Red Flag Warning for extreme grassland fire danger, which is in effect from 11 AM to 7 PM CST Tuesday. * Extreme Grassland Fire Danger...Is forecast. * Winds...South 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. Wind gusts may approach 50 mph across parts of southern Kansas. * Relative Humidity...As low as 25 to 35 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly and become very difficult to control. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this fire weather product.
